title: Temple of Demeter at the Sanctuary of Demeter Malophoros, Selinus
description: The Temple of Demeter was used for the worship of Demeter (Malophoros), goddess of fertility, grain and agriculture. Built in the seventh century BC, the temple was used continuously until its abandonment ca. 250 BC

properties.description: Representative imagery location of the archaeological site, verified in Google Earth 2016. Chronology following White 1967.
properties.title: Imagery location of Temple of Demeter at the Sanctuary of Demeter Malophoros
